com.zodoto.util.ducks

Interface DuckControl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DuckControlService

    public interface DuckControl
    Describes the central controller for a duck key source.
    Author:
    Pete Guard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DuckRange get(java.lang.String name)
      Get a range of keys using the default response size
      DuckRange get(java.lang.String name, int maximumSize)
      Get a key range up to the default response size
      DuckRange getOne(java.lang.String name)
      Get a single key
      DuckControl initialize()
      Load the keys from persistent store
      DuckControl preLoad(java.lang.String name)
      After startup have the Duck preload some known keys to prime the keysource Makes the first retrieve move faster
      DuckControl setDuckConfiguration(DuckConfiguration duckConfiguration)
      Provides the controller with the configuration
      DuckControl setDuckLog(DuckLog duckLog)
      Set the logger
      DuckControl setDuckPersist(DuckPersist duckPersist)
      Provides the controller with the persistence object
      DuckControl setDuckSource(DuckSource duckSource)
      Provides the controller with the source object (where we get more keys)
      void updateEgg(java.lang.String name, DuckRange duckRange)
      Call back from source
